name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Fluid Dynamics
lessons.description: Fundamental concepts of fluid mechanics relevant to aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Airfoil Theory
lessons.description: Principles of airfoil lift and drag generation.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Forces and Moments
lessons.description: Calculating and understanding forces and moments acting on aircraft.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow Characteristics
lessons.description: Behavior of airflow at speeds below the speed of sound.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow and Shockwaves
lessons.description: Aerodynamics at speeds exceeding the speed of sound, including shockwave formation.

lessons.name: Transonic Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Challenges and phenomena in the transonic flight regime.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer in High-Speed Flight
lessons.description: Principles of heat transfer at high aerodynamic speeds.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Methods and materials for protecting spacecraft from extreme heat.

lessons.name: Re-entry Aerothermodynamics
lessons.description: Aerodynamic heating challenges during atmospheric re-entry.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Structures
lessons.description: Overview of common spacecraft structural components and their functions.

lessons.name: Materials for Space Applications
lessons.description: Selection and properties of materials used in spacecraft construction.

lessons.name: Structural Load Analysis
lessons.description: Analyzing forces and stresses on spacecraft structures during launch and operation.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Kepler's Laws and Orbital Elements
lessons.description: Fundamental laws governing orbital motion and defining orbital paths.

lessons.name: Orbital Maneuvers
lessons.description: Techniques for changing spacecraft orbits and trajectories.

lessons.name: Mission Design and Trajectory Optimization
lessons.description: Planning spacecraft missions and optimizing their paths for efficiency.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Power Systems
lessons.description: Design and operation of power generation and distribution systems for spacecraft.

lessons.name: Attitude Determination and Control
lessons.description: Methods for controlling a spacecraft's orientation in space.

lessons.name: Command and Data Handling
lessons.description: Systems for receiving commands and transmitting data to and from spacecraft.

name: Hydrocarbons and Functional Groups
description: Introduction to the basic building blocks of organic compounds.

lessons.name: Alkanes, Alkenes, and Alkynes
lessons.description: Structure and nomenclature of basic hydrocarbon families.

lessons.name: Aromatic Compounds
lessons.description: Introduction to benzene and other aromatic systems.

lessons.name: Common Functional Groups
lessons.description: Exploring alcohols, ethers, aldehydes, ketones, and carboxylic acids.

name: Organic Reactions and Mechanisms
description: Understanding how organic molecules react and the pathways they take.

lessons.name: Substitution Reactions
lessons.description: Nucleophilic substitution (SN1, SN2) and electrophilic aromatic substitution.

lessons.name: Elimination Reactions
lessons.description: E1 and E2 mechanisms and their applications.

lessons.name: Addition Reactions
lessons.description: Electrophilic and nucleophilic addition to alkenes and carbonyls.

name: Spectroscopy and Structure Determination
description: Techniques for identifying and characterizing organic compounds.

lessons.name: Infrared (IR) Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Using IR to identify functional groups.

lessons.name: Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Principles of 1H and 13C NMR for structural elucidation.

lessons.name: Mass Spectrometry (MS)
lessons.description: Determining molecular weight and fragmentation patterns.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Study of metal complexes and their bonding.

lessons.name: Ligands and Coordination Numbers
lessons.description: Types of ligands and how they bind to metal centers.

lessons.name: Nomenclature and Isomerism
lessons.description: Naming conventions and different types of isomerism in coordination compounds.

lessons.name: Crystal Field Theory
lessons.description: Understanding electronic structure and properties of transition metal complexes.

name: Main Group and Transition Metal Chemistry
description: Properties and reactions of elements across the periodic table.

lessons.name: Chemistry of Main Group Elements
lessons.description: Survey of elements in the s and p blocks.

lessons.name: Transition Metals and Their Reactivity
lessons.description: Unique properties and catalytic roles of d-block elements.

lessons.name: Organometallic Chemistry Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to compounds with metal-carbon bonds.

name: Inorganic Materials and Applications
description: Real-world uses of inorganic compounds.

lessons.name: Solid State Chemistry
lessons.description: Structures and properties of inorganic solids.

lessons.name: Catalysis in Inorganic Chemistry
lessons.description: Role of inorganic compounds as catalysts in industrial processes.

lessons.name: Bioinorganic Chemistry
lessons.description: Metal ions in biological systems and their functions.

name: Chemical Thermodynamics
description: Energy transformations in chemical reactions.

lessons.name: First Law of Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Conservation of energy, enthalpy, and heat capacity.

lessons.name: Second and Third Laws of Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Entropy, spontaneity, and Gibbs free energy.

lessons.name: Chemical Equilibrium
lessons.description: Understanding equilibrium constants and reaction spontaneity.

name: Chemical Kinetics
description: Rates and mechanisms of chemical reactions.

lessons.name: Reaction Rates and Rate Laws
lessons.description: Defining reaction rates and determining rate laws experimentally.

lessons.name: Reaction Mechanisms and Transition State Theory
lessons.description: Understanding step-by-step pathways of reactions.

lessons.name: Catalysis and Enzyme Kinetics
lessons.description: How catalysts affect reaction rates and an introduction to enzyme kinetics.

name: Quantum Mechanics and Spectroscopy
description: The quantum nature of atoms and molecules and their interaction with light.

lessons.name: Introduction to Quantum Mechanics
lessons.description: Wave-particle duality, Schrödinger equation, and atomic orbitals.

lessons.name: Molecular Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Vibrational, rotational, and electronic spectroscopy.

lessons.name: Statistical Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Connecting microscopic properties to macroscopic thermodynamic behavior.

name: Elvish Languages: Sindarin and Quenya
description: A deep dive into the two primary Elvish languages.

lessons.name: Introduction to Quenya
lessons.description: Grammar, vocabulary, and common phrases of High Elvish.

lessons.name: Introduction to Sindarin
lessons.description: Grammar, vocabulary, and common phrases of Grey Elvish.

lessons.name: Elvish Writing Systems (Tengwar)
lessons.description: Learning to read and write in the elegant Tengwar script.

name: Dwarvish (Khuzdul) and Black Speech
description: Exploring the languages of Dwarves and the evil forces.

lessons.name: Khuzdul: The Secret Tongue
lessons.description: Overview of Dwarvish language, its structure, and limited known vocabulary.

lessons.name: Runes of the Dwarves (Cirth)
lessons.description: Understanding the angular Cirth script used by Dwarves.

lessons.name: The Black Speech of Mordor
lessons.description: Analysis of its grim origins and the infamous Ring-inscription.

name: Linguistic Lore of Middle-earth
description: The philological depth and influence of languages on Middle-earth's history.

lessons.name: Tolkien's Linguistic Genius
lessons.description: How J.R.R. Tolkien created his languages and their internal consistency.

lessons.name: Language and Culture in Middle-earth
lessons.description: The symbiotic relationship between the various tongues and their speakers' cultures.

lessons.name: The Evolution of Middle-earth Languages
lessons.description: Tracing the historical development and divergence of the different linguistic families.

name: The Councils and Alliances of the Free Peoples
description: Analyzing key diplomatic gatherings and pacts.

lessons.name: The Council of Elrond
lessons.description: In-depth study of the pivotal meeting and its diplomatic implications.

lessons.name: The Last Alliance of Elves and Men
lessons.description: Examining the formation and challenges of this grand alliance.

lessons.name: Relations Between Rivendell and Mirkwood
lessons.description: Exploring diplomatic ties between different Elvish factions.

name: Leadership, Wisdom, and Conflict Resolution
description: The role of key figures in shaping inter-species relations.

lessons.name: Gandalf's Diplomatic Role
lessons.description: Analyzing the Wizard's influence and strategies in fostering cooperation.

lessons.name: The Leadership of Aragorn and Théoden
lessons.description: Case studies on human leadership in times of crisis and alliance-building.

lessons.name: Resolving Disputes: Dwarves and Elves
lessons.description: Historical instances of conflict and reconciliation between these races.

name: War and Diplomacy in the Third Age
description: How alliances and conflicts shaped the fate of Middle-earth.

lessons.name: The War of the Ring: A Diplomatic Failure or Success?
lessons.description: Analyzing the grand strategies and inter-species coordination during the war.

lessons.name: Propaganda and Psychological Warfare
lessons.description: How different factions used information and fear in their campaigns.

lessons.name: Post-War Reconstruction and Relations
lessons.description: The impact of the war on future interactions between the races.
